reviewText: Great documentary for those surfers unaware of the power of the Great Lakes and for those who enjoy surfing.
A must for anyone interested in surfing fresh water.  Includes some great surfing footage as well as the search for perfect waves.

pretty sweet video since i live on lake ontario and am into surfing. if you like surfing videos this is a good buy. it even does a background of all the great lakes which was neat.

well worth it!
